com.sudoplay.axion.stream

Class AxionOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • com.sudoplay.axion.stream.AxionOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class AxionOutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream
    This is basically a DataOutputStream modified to support a custom CharacterEncoder.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.FilterOutputStream
